sentence.Network_en: Do we have to subject her illness to this pseudoscientific analysis?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们还要用这种伪科学来分析她的病 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: she also posted a message to a news group that said , " Quackwatch appears to be a power-hungry , misguided bunch of pseudoscientific socialistic bigots , " among other things .她还在互联网新闻组发表了一则消息，除提到其他事情外，该消息说：“‘警惕庸医’看来是一帮子渴望权力、误入歧途的伪科学的社会主义顽固分子。”

means.word_mean: 1. based on theories and methods erroneously regarded as scientific
